headline: Rothschild & Co LongRun Equity’s Investment Thesis for Cadence Design Systems (CDNS)
summary: Rothschild & Co Wealth Management, an investment management company, released its LongRun Equity strategy third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The firm is a committed long-term business owner, focused on a portfolio of high-quality companies. The strategy returned +3.9 % (in EUR, unhedged) in the third quarter, underperforming […]
